inputs.name: enableLongRunningValidationAnalysis
inputs.label: Enable Long Running Validation Analysis
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enabling this option allows PR Insights to post information on pipeline tasks that regress a configurable amount over a configurable percentile on the target branch

inputs.name: longRunningValidationTaskTypes
inputs.label: Long Running Validation Task Types
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Types of tasks to be potentially considered as long running, if no types are given, all types will be analyzed 
 Note: Seperate each type with a comma

inputs.name: longRunningValidationPercentile
inputs.label: Long Running Validation Percentile
inputs.helpMarkDown: The duration percentile on the target branch to compare validations with in order to determine if the validations are long running

inputs.name: longRunningValidationMinimumDuration
inputs.label: Long Running Validation Minimum Duration (in seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The minimum duration (in seconds) of a validation for it to be potentially considered long running 
 Note: Minimum is 1 second

inputs.name: longRunningValidationMinimumRegression
inputs.label: Long Running Validation Minimum Regression (in seconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The minimum regression (in seconds) of a validation from the given duration percentile on the target branch for it to be potentially considered long running 
 Note: Minimum is 1 second

inputs.name: checkStatusLink
inputs.label: Check Status Link
inputs.helpMarkDown:
A link that is offered to users to check on the status of the target branch 
 Note: Default link is to definition summary page
